# Code of Conduct

We are committed to creating a welcoming and inclusive environment. We follow the [Contributor Covenant](https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/code_of_conduct/) with the following expectations:

- Respect all participants regardless of background, experience, gender, identity, or beliefs.
- Provide constructive feedback and be open to receiving it.
- Report unacceptable behavior to security@intunelabs.example.

Breach of this code may result in temporary or permanent exclusion from the community and repos.
